name: --shots
description: An application for creating screenshots. Available for LInux, MacOS, WIndows

releases.name: v1.2.0
releases.body:
# Integrate we love

## Social network
Now you could post your screenshots from --shots to Facebook, Twitter, VKontakte!
> Socials > Post on ...

## Dropbox
Want to save your screenshot to Dropbox? No problems! Simply sign in and then save!

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8722478/22920696/74471c3c-f2a7-11e6-8477-76e5412f7828.png)
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8722478/22920719/8da0ac7a-f2a7-11e6-93c4-b593a8da7b5c.png)

## Imgur
Not satisfied with dropbox? OK, we provide an alternative to you... Imgur!
Sign in and save :)

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8722478/22920839/0f6a245c-f2a8-11e6-8b13-5bc1e9012b3b.png)
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8722478/22920813/f2c67a6c-f2a7-11e6-8374-472c2f9f1721.png)

> Imgur server sometimes very busy, so possible problems with authorization.

### Dropbox and Imgur
You should to sign in only once(not for every saving).
For authorization we use OAuth 2.0

## MacOS
This version support MacOS!
___
That's all, folks.
***Thanks for your support and see you soon!***

releases.name: v1.1.0
releases.body:
# What's new

## Shortcuts
Now you can disable global shortcut(`CtrlOrCommand + Alt + M` for example) to avoid conflict with another apps or sites. https://github.com/binjospookie/--shots/issues/19

## Copy to clipboard
--shots learned to save screenshots to clipboard(`Settings -> Copy to clipboard`). https://github.com/binjospookie/--shots/issues/20

## Home folder
`--shots` folder is unnecessary. So, you could remove it. https://github.com/binjospookie/--shots/issues/16

## All your progress will be lost. Are you sure?
Fixed behaviour of these messagebox. https://github.com/binjospookie/--shots/issues/18

## Settings
Now settings have live reload (without restarting app).

## Pacman
:bat: shots.pacman has returned! :bat: 

## New sticker
Where do without it?
___

## One moment

When you'll update --shots to v1.1.0 some of your settings could be reseted. All previous versions are deprecated.
___

***Thank you @YanLobat and @orschiro for help with these release!***
____
That's all, folks.
***Thanks for your support!***

releases.name: v1.0.4
releases.body:
This release doesn't include version for MacOS. I'll try to pack in on weekends. So..

## What's new

### New shortcut
I added global shortcut `ControlOrCommand + Alt + M` for creating screenshots. Now you don't even need to reach for the tray!

### https://github.com/binjospookie/--shots/issues/4
Thx @YanLobat for resolving this issue!
___
That's all, folks.
***Thanks for your support!***

releases.name: v1.0.4-rc
releases.body:
# v1.0.4-rc

v1.0.4-rc will be released ASAP.

Thank you for your interest to project.

releases.name: v1.0.3
releases.body: 3 month ago first commit was written. ## What's new? ### Console commands ### New shortcut I added `CtrlOrCmd + L` for fast local saving. ### Local save's improving Now you can choose destination and filename for your screenshot! ### Pen's bug Was fixed! :sun_with_face: **_Small improvements was added too.**_ --- Download new version and tell about --shots to your friends. **_See you soon.**_

releases.name: v1.0.2
releases.body:
# v1.0.2 ## What's new? --- ### Delay Now you can set delay before capture
### Updated pen Now you can draw straight lines! Just press `Shift` and start drawing.
### New sticker Yoba face was added.
### Portable These release includes portable version for Windows! --- Thanks for your support. At least one more version will be published, cause of https://github.com/binjospookie/--shots/issues/4
Download new version and tell about --shots to your friends. **_See you soon**_.

releases.name: v1.0.1
releases.body:
# v1.0.1

Hello. I replaced standard links to shorten.

```
Before: 
    https://theshots.ru/saved/490358226583d477e019087.23023690.png
After:
    http://bit.ly/2geilsZ
```

You don't need to download new version of app. It's works right now.

releases.name: v1.0.0
releases.body:
# v1.0.0 ## What's new? ### Text's tool Hooray! Now --shots support text tool ### Color picker Your shapes can be colored :art: ### MacOS, WIndows Bugs were fixed and --shot supports WIndows and MacOS again.
## What's next? I think that the project is ready, so... I'll be fix bugs if it's will be necessary, but new features won't be added. **_Links for download are below:**_

releases.name: v0.1.3
releases.body: # v0.1.3 This version only for for LInux. It include many improvements. Version for Windows and MacOS will be include this changes and: - new gif for Windows (on install) - fixed tray's bug (MacOS) ## LIst of improvements: - Pepe and doge were added - Drag and drop (fixed) - Window position (fixed) - Ability to send review - Reset tools on save (fixed) - Admin panel was added to menu - Z-index for blur (fixed) - Checkbox redesign - More than one process - Crop after new (new option) **See you soon!**

releases.name: v0.1.2
releases.body:
# Updates: ## [Add states for tools](https://github.com/binjospookie/--shots/issues/1) Now tools are not resets after each mouseUp. If you want quit from tools just press `D` or click right mouse button and choose `Default`. ## Alerts Warnings were replaced by cute pop-ups. ## Party parrot New sticker(like Emoji) was added to Emoji's list. ## Site I update video on site and add a small blog. ## Filter in admin panel Now you can filter your screenshots by Asc or Desc! ## Blur tool Sometimes it is impossible to crop the screenshot so that it didn't contain some things you don't want to show... Meet Blur! ## Tray Firstly: now app appear in tray and doesn't create screenshot(after running). You should click `New` in tray's menu to create first screenshot. Further behavior of app doesn't changed. Secondly: I added `Minimize to tray` menu's item which allow you remove app from dock.
See yourself: **_upd: it doesn' work for MacOS, I'll write an issue.**_ ## Rotate To rotate figures(Rect, Emoji and Arrow) you must use the handle zoom.
:bug: **_Minor bugs were fixed!**_ :bug: Big thanks to [Vladislav Romanov](https://vk.com/avatar4pro) for testing! :rabbit: Download the app for your OS and start sharing screenshots! See you soon.

releases.name: v0.1.1
releases.body:
# What's new?

## Cursor's capture

Now you have the option of capturing the cursor in the screenshot, which can be enabled in the settings.

![Cursor capturing](http://shots.binjo.ru/saved/202086313580281d9a234e9.87367656.png)

## Personal account

Manage your screenshots from your personal account
Just sign up [here](http://theshots.ru/registration/) and log into the app ("More" -> "Sign In") .
[There](https://theshots.ru/admin/) you can view, copy the link and delete your screenshots.

![Admin panel](http://shots.binjo.ru/saved/15837765095802832fbf05f5.76392268.png)

## Emoji

Add emotions to the screenshots! Use hotkeys or open `Tools->Emoji` :tada: :

## Version for MacOS

Now version for MacOS is available.

## Version for Windows

Now the application can be install in the operating system. And icon was added.

## Secure connection

Now working with --shots has become safer, due to the transition to `https`.

## Additionally

Interface's improvements.

_Download the app for your OS and start sharing screenshots!_
